definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Objective To determine the recurrent reasons about tubercular goiters after operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的为探讨结节性甲状腺肿术后复发的原因。

sentences.english: Goiters have plagued humans for at least several thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 甲状腺肿大至少已经有几千年历史了。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnosis and operation of substernal goiter .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸骨后甲状腺肿的诊断和手术方式。

sentences.english: One cause of goitre is iodine deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 原因之一甲状腺肿是缺碘。

sentences.english: Simple ( endemic ) goitre , the most common, is due to low iodine intake.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的甲状腺肿是由于碘的摄入量不足。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the ultrasound examination of the diagnostic value of struma ovarii.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声检查对卵巢甲状腺肿的诊断价值。

sentences.english: To investigate the role of fine needle aspiration cytology for the diagnosis of thyroid tumor.
sentences.chinese: 探讨细针吸取细胞学检查对甲状腺肿物的诊断价值。

sentences.english: As a result, goiters were rare in the region.
sentences.chinese: 结果就是这个地区很少有甲状腺肿大。

sentences.english: It can also cause the swelling of the thyroids , damage the optic nerve and the motor nerve.
sentences.chinese: 还可引起甲状腺肿，并会伤害视神经和运动神经等。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical and pathological features of struma ovary .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨卵巢甲状腺肿的临床和病理学特征。

sentences.english: Except for mild simple goiters, all patients were treated and satisfactory results were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 除轻度单纯性甲状腺肿外均进行了治疗，效果较好。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of the surgical treatment of toxic multinodular goiter(TMNG).
sentences.chinese: 目的总结毒性结节性甲状腺肿的治疗体会。

sentences.english: Comparison diagnosis of ultrasonography and pathology in436cases with thyroid adenoma.
sentences.chinese: 436例甲状腺肿块超声诊断与病理结果对照分析。

sentences.english: To study the diagnosis and treatment of substernal goiter.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸骨后甲状腺肿的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: This diffusely enlarged thyroid gland is somewhat nodular.
sentences.chinese: 弥漫性甲状腺肿在一定程度上是结节状。

pinyin: jia3 zhuang4 xian4 gong1 neng2 kang4 jin4

definition: hyperthyroidism/abbr. for 甲狀腺功能亢進|甲状腺功能亢进[jia3 zhuang4 xian4 gong1 neng2 kang4 jin4]
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
